001
002package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node;
003
004import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
005import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
006
007import java.util.Collection;
008import java.util.List;
009import java.util.Map;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012
013/**
014 * This mixin interface indicates that the implementation is a {@link INodeItem}
015 * that may have both flag and model children.
016 */
017public interface IFeatureModelContainerItem extends IFeatureFlagContainerItem {
018
019  @Override
020  ModelContainer getModel();
021
022  @Override
023  default Collection<? extends List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>>> getModelItems() {
024    return getModel().getModelItems();
025  }
026
027  @Override
028  default List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> getModelItemsByName(IEnhancedQName name) {
029    return getModel().getModelItemsByName(name);
030  }
031
032  /**
033   * Provides an abstract implementation of a lazy loaded model.
034   */
035  class ModelContainer
036      extends FlagContainer {
037    private final Map<Integer, List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>>> modelItems;
038
039    /**
040     * Creates a new collection of flags and model items.
041     *
042     * @param flags
043     *          a mapping of flag name to a flag item
044     * @param modelItems
045     *          a mapping of model item name to a list of model items
046     */
047    protected ModelContainer(
048        @NonNull Map<Integer, IFlagNodeItem> flags,
049        @NonNull Map<Integer, List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>>> modelItems) {
050      super(flags);
051      this.modelItems = modelItems;
052    }
053
054    /**
055     * Get the matching list of model items having the provided name.
056     *
057     * @param name
058     *          the name of the model items to retrieve
059     * @return a lisy of matching model items or {@code null} if no match was found
060     */
061    @NonNull
062    public List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> getModelItemsByName(@NonNull IEnhancedQName name) {
063      List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> result = modelItems.get(name.getIndexPosition());
064      return result == null ? CollectionUtil.emptyList() : result;
065    }
066
067    /**
068     * Get all model items grouped by model item name.
069     *
070     * @return a collection of lists containg model items grouped by names
071     */
072    @SuppressWarnings("null")
073    @NonNull
074    public Collection<List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>>> getModelItems() {
075      return modelItems.values();
076    }
077  }
078}
